sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Xpdf package contains xpdf, pdftops, pdftotext, pdftopbm.

sect3.title: pdftops
sect3.para: pdftops converts PDF files to PostScript (PS) format.

sect3.title: pdftotext
sect3.para: pdftotext parses ASCII text from PDF files.

sect3.title: pdftopbm
sect3.para: pdftopbm converts PDF files to PBM (Portable BitMap) format.
